title: Group portrait of wedding party with five men, including groom James S. Ligons wearing light colored dinner jacket, best man Frank Ligons, and possibly Robert Robinson, Lloyd Briscoe, and Charles Stevenson; five women, including bride Verna Stevenson Ligons wearing lace wedding gown with full skirt and long lace fingerless gloves, maid of honor Geraldine Johnson, Sandra Cole, Sharon Ann Ligons, and Audrey Gorman; ring bearer Kevin Copeland, and flower girl Debra Stevenson, posed in Metropolitan Baptist Church
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
